    • Constructor Detail

      • UltrasonicSensor

        public UltrasonicSensor(VirtualFunctionBus virtualFunctionBus,
                        int relativeX,
                        int relativeY,
                        double relativeRotation,
                        AutomatedCar car,
                        int index)
        Constructor for the ultrasonic sensor
        Parameters:
        virtualFunctionBus - the virtual function bus used by the system components
        relativeX - the sensor's X coordinate relative to the car
        relativeY - the sensor's Y coordinate relative to the car
        relativeRotation - the sensor's rotation relative to the car (in degrees)
        car - the car the sensor belongs to
        index - the current sensor's index (to be used with the sent packets)

    • Method Detail

      • createUltrasonicSensors

        public static void createUltrasonicSensors(AutomatedCar car,
                                           VirtualFunctionBus virtualFunctionBus)
        Creates the ultrasonic sensors and adds them to the car's list of ultrasonic sensors.
        Parameters:
        car - the car the sensors belong to
        virtualFunctionBus - the virtual function bus used by the system components

      • getNearestObject

        public Collidable getNearestObject()
        Gets the collidable object nearest to the sensor.
        Returns:
        the collidable object that is closest to the sensor, null if no such object exists.

      • getNearestObjectDistance

        public Double getNearestObjectDistance()
        Gets the distance of the closest collidable object to the sensor.
        Returns:
        the distance between the sensor and the closest collidable object, null if no such object exists.

      • getNearestObjectDimensions

        public int[] getNearestObjectDimensions()
        Gets the dimensions of the nearest collidable object.
        Returns:
        an int[] array where the first element is the width and the second element is the height of the object, null if no such object exists.

      • loop

        public void loop()
        Specified by:
        loop in class SystemComponent
